turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a drink from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what starbucks would you like to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Connecticut Avenue in Washington DC.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Cinnamon shortbread frapp.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok want size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is there anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it without cinnamon on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, when would you like it ready?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and charge your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it should be ready for pick up soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
